data.text:
Concern:
How will we ensure that there are not duplicate messages sent via Ditto AND Tak Server when the user goes from offline to online?

(Ex: Offline message is broadcast via mesh network, then sent again via Tak Server when user connects to internet)

Possible Solutions:
dedupe function
unique ID per message

Concern:
How will we ensure that there are not duplicate messages sent via Ditto AND Tak Server when the user goes from offline to online?

(Ex: Offline message is broadcast via mesh network, then sent again via Tak Server when user connects to internet)

Possible Solutions:
dedupe function
unique ID per message

cards.name: https://www.loom.com/share/0e6813b76cd44ca48d892af56be658f5?sid=80638cfb-e43b-42df-8940-63f4811bb13f

cards.desc:
**Quickly add to-dos from email, Slack, Microsoft Teams, and more!**

- **Send emails to your Trello Inbox as cards** for reminders and to-dos by forwarding an email to [inbox@app.trello.com](mailto:inbox@app.trello.com "â"). Find out more by [visiting our help page](https://support.atlassian.com/trello/docs/creating-cards-by-email/ "â").
- **Save important messages from Slack and Microsoft Teams** **to your Inbox** so you can read, process, and prioritize them later. Try out the different ways in the checklist below!

[https://www.loom.com/share/f6b5f37a57904b56ae05ce6f1a4c5225?sid=e0eb8092-414f-4eaf-99c4-d13f864fcb05](https://www.loom.com/share/f6b5f37a57904b56ae05ce6f1a4c5225?sid=e0eb8092-414f-4eaf-99c4-d13f864fcb05 "smartCard-embed")

[https://www.loom.com/share/edbf69cbd3074bc1a9bbc5569b5f4d60?sid=e225b951-a4b8-4d0f-b2e2-69299423aab4](https://www.loom.com/share/edbf69cbd3074bc1a9bbc5569b5f4d60?sid=e225b951-a4b8-4d0f-b2e2-69299423aab4 "smartCard-embed")

[https://www.loom.com/share/5893d52dac36450f8e1f1190d8e92282](https://www.loom.com/share/5893d52dac36450f8e1f1190d8e92282 "smartCard-embed")
cards.name: Capture from email, Slack, and Teams

cards.desc:
- **Organize your to-dos with boards** by curating Lists and using card features
- **Schedule with Planner** by connecting your calendar to Trello and scheduling time to focus on getting things done.
- **Tie it all together** by viewing your Inbox, boards, and Planner side-by-side to organize all your to-dos. You can expand or collapse each panel using the navigation bar.

[https://www.loom.com/share/0b76968e11e74f54affba7e080800c91?sid=aef7ae51-8273-4cfc-9e66-0226e8084592](https://www.loom.com/share/0b76968e11e74f54affba7e080800c91?sid=aef7ae51-8273-4cfc-9e66-0226e8084592 "smartCard-embed")
cards.name: Dive into Trello basics

cards.desc:
**Trello brings all your ideas, to-dos, and tools together wherever you go!**

[Get the mobile app](https://trello.com/platforms "â") :iphone: and escape the clutter and chaos of scattered tasks.

[https://www.loom.com/share/c9fcc8326c86478b9d052be88b133ba4?sid=40430591-d8bd-4b61-9074-ee220f083422](https://www.loom.com/share/c9fcc8326c86478b9d052be88b133ba4?sid=40430591-d8bd-4b61-9074-ee220f083422 "smartCard-embed")

cards.desc: Supercharge your productivity in Trello with features like **automation, AI, card mirroring,** and **Power-ups**.

checkItems.name: Get the Trello mobile app https://trello.com/platforms
Add a to-do to :inbox_tray: Inbox from :iphone: mobile
Use :microphone: voice-to-capture from your iPhone to add a to-do to Inbox by saying "Hey Siri, add [Card name] to Trello"
Toggle :left_right_arrow: the icons in the navigation bar to see different views of your boards, Inbox, Planner, and the Board Switcher
Connect your calendar :calendar:
Schedule time for your to-dos by dragging and dropping a card from :inbox_tray: Inbox to :arrow_right: Planner :calendar:
Organize your to-dos by dragging and dropping a card from :inbox_tray: Inbox to :arrow_right: board
Add a due date :calendar: to the card of an upcoming to-do
Add and apply labels or custom fields to organize your cards (i.e. work, personal, high, medium, or low)
Mark a to-do as complete by hovering over a card and selecting "mark complete" :white_check_mark:

checklists.name: Try capturing to-dos from Email and Slack ð§

checkItems.name: Send an email to inbox@app.trello.com from the email associated with your Trello account
[Open Trello in Slack](https://slack.com/app_redirect?app=A074YH40Z)
Add a Trello card from Slack by using Slack's 'Save for later' feature
Add a Trello card from Slack by reacting to a message with the :inbox_tray: emoji
[Connect your Trello and Microsoft Teams accounts](https://teams.microsoft.com/l/app/49e6f432-d79c-49e8-94f7-89b94f3672fd)
Add a Trello card from Microsoft Teams by clicking on the message in Teams and selecting 'Create card'
Improve your communication with cardback descriptions or comments with Trello AI :sparkles: https://www.atlassian.com/blog/trello/introducing-ai-powered-trello
Set up a :repeat: repeatable task with automation https://trello.com/guide/automate-anything
Mirror :eyes: a card to view or edit it from more than one board
Get more Trello superpowers and integrations by adding Power-ups :sparkles: https://trello.com/power-ups
